title: High photocatalytic efficiency of a ZnO nanoplate/Fe2O3 nanospindle hybrid using visible light for methylene blue degradation
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28244-28259
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04230A, Paper

Nguyen Dac Dien, Thi Thu Ha Pham, Xuan Hoa Vu, Vuong Truong Xuan, Thi Thu Thuy Nguyen, Tran Thu Trang, Nguyen Van Hao, Pham Thi Nga, Tran Thi Kim Chi, Tran Thi Huong Giang, Nguyen Duc Toan
In this work, ZnO nanoplates and Fe2O3 nanospindles were successfully fabricated via a simple hydrothermal method using inorganic salts as precursors.
